title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.31 - Gross weight of aircraft using La Guardia Airport restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.31 - Gross weight of aircraft using La Guardia Airport restricted

State Regulations

No aircraft on a dual tandem gear having an actual
gross weight of over 200,000 pounds and no aircraft on a dual gear having an
actual gross weight of over 161,000 pounds, including passengers, cargo, fuel, equipment, etc., shall land, take off or taxi at La Guardia Airport without
permission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1261.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
